title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 198: Featuring Ryane Clowe + Terry Ryan Sr.
description:
On this week's episode of Spittin' Chiclets, the guys wrap up Newfoundland Week with two more guests from The Rock. Ryane Clowe joins the boys to talk about his time in San Jose, some Jumbo Joe stories and what he's up to now. The boys are then joined by Terry Ryan Sr. to talk all things old time hockey and Newfoundland. The guys touch on some NHL news including Caps forward Evgeny Kuznetsov testing positive for a certain white powdery drug.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
